about_the_game:
Condition Zero is an exhilarating FPS zombie shooter created using the powerful Unreal Engine 5. One of its standout features is its engaging multiplayer mode, which allows players to team up with friends or face off against other players.

MULTIPLAYER
Undead Awakening offers a thrilling multiplayer experience that adds a new level of excitement to the game. Gather your friends and form a team to tackle the zombie apocalypse together in cooperative multiplayer mode. Strategize, communicate, and work together to survive the relentless waves of undead enemies.

If you're seeking a competitive challenge, Undead Awakening also provides intense multiplayer battles. Engage in adrenaline-pumping firefights as you face off against other players in modes like Team Deathmatch (TDM), Free-for-All (FFA), Capture the Flag (CTF), and more. Test your skills, aim, and strategy against real opponents to prove your dominance in the post-apocalyptic world.

ZOMBIES
In Undead Awakening, players are tasked with surviving waves of relentless zombies, testing their survival skills to the limit. How long can you hold out against the undead hordes? Don't face the apocalypse alone; invite your friends to join you in a cooperative zombie-slaying experience. Team up, strategize, and fight back against the zombie menace together.

FIRING RANGE
For those who want to master the art of combat, Undead Awakening offers a dedicated firing range. This feature allows players to familiarize themselves with the behavior and mechanics of each weapon available in the game. By honing your skills in the firing range, you'll gain a competitive edge in battles, improving your accuracy, timing, and overall effectiveness in combat.

Prepare yourself for heart-pounding action, relentless undead enemies, and immersive gameplay! Whether you're fighting off hordes of zombies, engaging in thrilling multiplayer battles, or honing your shooting skills in the firing range, the game promises an adrenaline-fueled experience you won't want to miss.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains gore and blood.
